name: @opensrp/location-management
description: Location management components for opensrp web

scripts.test: cd ../../ && jest test  packages/location-management --verbose --collectCoverage=true && cd packages/location-management
scripts.test:watch: cd ../../ && jest test  packages/location-management --verbose --watch && cd packages/location-management
scripts.build: yarn run tsc && yarn run transpile && yarn run copy
scripts.add-location-mangement: yarn run tsc && yarn run transpile:windows && yarn run copy && cd ../../client && yarn add file:../packages/location-management && yarn start

author: OpenSRP Engineering
